Package org.apache.logging.log4j.kit.env

Interface PropertyEnvironment

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicPropertyEnvironment, ClassLoaderPropertyEnvironment, CompositePropertyEnvironment, PropertiesUtilPropertyEnvironment
public interface PropertyEnvironment
Represents the main access point to Log4j properties.

It provides as typesafe way to access properties stored in multiple PropertySources, type conversion methods and property aggregation methods (cf. getProperty(Class)).

  • Method Details

    • getGlobal

      static PropertyEnvironment getGlobal()

    • getBooleanProperty

      default boolean getBooleanProperty(String name)
      Gets the named property as a boolean value. If the property matches the string "true" (case-insensitive), then it is returned as the boolean value true. Any other non-null text in the property is considered false.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property to look up
      Returns:
      the boolean value of the property or false if undefined.

    • getBooleanProperty

      Boolean getBooleanProperty(String name, Boolean defaultValue)
      Gets the named property as a boolean value.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property to look up
      defaultValue - the default value to use if the property is undefined
      Returns:
      the boolean value of the property or defaultValue if undefined.

    • getCharsetProperty

      default Charset getCharsetProperty(String name)
      Gets the named property as a Charset value.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property to look up
      Returns:
      the Charset value of the property or Charset.defaultCharset() if undefined.

    • getCharsetProperty

    • getClassProperty

      <T> @Nullable Class<? extends T> getClassProperty(String name, Class<T> upperBound)
      Gets the named property as a Class value.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property to look up
      upperBound - the upper bound for the class
      Returns:
      the Class value of the property or null if it can not be loaded.

    • getClassProperty

      <T> Class<? extends T> getClassProperty(String name, Class<? extends T> defaultValue, Class<T> upperBound)
      Gets the named property as a subclass of upperBound.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the property to look up
      defaultValue - the default value to use if the property is undefined
      upperBound - the upper bound for the class
      Returns:
      the Class value of the property or defaultValue if it can not be loaded.

    • getDurationProperty

      default Duration getDurationProperty(String name)
      Gets the named property as Duration.
      Parameters:
      name - The property name.
      Returns:
      The value of the String as a Duration or Duration.ZERO if it was undefined or could not be parsed.

      defaultValue - The default value.
      Returns:

    • getProperty

      <T> T getProperty(Class<T> propertyClass)
      Binds properties to class T.

      The implementation should at least support binding Java records with a single public constructor and enums.

      Parameters:
      propertyClass - a class annotated by Log4jProperty.
      Returns:
      an instance of T with all JavaBean properties bound.
